title: Shivanagi
text:
Shivanagi is a village in the southern state of <a href="Karnataka">Karnataka</a>, India. It is located in the <a href="Bijapur%2C%20Karnataka">Bijapur</a> <a href="taluk">taluk</a> of <a href="Bijapur%20district%2C%20Karnataka">Vijayapura district</a> in Karnataka.
Demographics.
 India <a href="census">census</a>, Shivanagi had a population of 8068 with 3669 males and 3399 females.
